Query - Interface in p2p.index
Defines the operations that queries support.
Query - Class in pgrid
This class represents a query message.

Creates a new empty Query.
Query(PGridHost, Type, String, Key) - Constructor for class pgrid.Query
Creates a new Query for a given search string.
Query(PGridHost, Type, String, int) - Constructor for class pgrid.Query
Creates a new Query for a given search string.
Query(PGridHost, GUID, Type, String, Key, int, int, int) - Constructor for class pgrid.Query
Creates a new Query with a given search string, path, index and minimum speed.
QUERY_MODE - Static variable in class pgrid.core.maintenance.identity.CoUPolicy.MappingHandler
This mode will query P-Grid dans put the host in a variable that could be retreived with getRequestedHost.
QUERY_PROCESSING_TIMEOUT - Static variable in class pgrid.Constants
The delay before a query is considered as over
